title: Issues loading champ select
body:
After accepting a game it starts to load the champ select menu but takes 15 to 20 seconds to load. It used to take 5 seconds max.
I don't have any antivirus software installed, windows defender is disabled as is Cortana.
It was working fine a month ago but I installed MS Office and a few new games since I last played League. 
There was an update but not sure if it had anything to do with this issue. I have uninstalled all games and MS Office assuming one of these may have caused it.
My specs, 
Windows 10 with Internet connection of 50 down and 5 up with in game ping averaging 70
PC is Intel 5820k, 16 gb ddr4 2400, Nvidia EVGA 970 FTW and a Samsung 830 Pro SSD.
Drivers are all up to date. Maybe getting an 960 Pro drive would speed things up?

replies.body: Is this happening in both clients or just in one? There are some known issues going on with the Beta Client in champ select, but I'll need more details to determine if this is what's going on with you. I recommend testing this with a few custom matches in order to avoid any penalties from disconnecting or failing to join a match.

Until you brought it up I had thought that the original client was already discontinued. I tried with the classic and it's fine, loads champ select as soon as everyone accepts. It even loaded the game faster. Until recently I haven't had issues with the new client. Thank you
